result.execSummary:
The defendant Matthew A Riegel was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine to be paid within 20 days; alternate 6 days jail.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Matthew A Riegel

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: from Defendant's wife filed by Defense

Defendant Matthew A Riegel in court with attorney Peter M Wolff.  David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Prosecuting attorney moves to amend Ct. 1 to Disorderly Conduct contrary to section 13.102(c)(8)  of the Waukesha County Code of Ordinances.  Court approves amendment.  No contest plea entered. Court finds defendant guilty. Ct. 2 dismissed and read-in. 

Court orders the following:
Ct. 1:
- Fine totaling $267.50 to be paid within 20 days; alternate 6 days jail
Jury trial - 12 person at 09-29-2015 08:30 am
Jury status hearing at 09-24-2015 09:30 am

Attorney Peter M Wolff in court.   Defendant Matthew A Riegel did not appear.   Michele W. Hulgaard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney appears by authorization. Defense asked the DA's office for a revised pre-trial. Defense requests one more date or a jury status/jury trial. Court will give a jury status/jury trial date.  Jury status hearing scheduled for September 24, 2015 at 09:30 am.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for September 29, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 24, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Peter M Wolff in court.   Defendant Matthew A Riegel did not appear.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney appears by authorization. Defense advises his client is in counseling with the VA and requests another date for plea/sentencing. Court will give a date in 3 weeks.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Hearing on August 4, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Matthew A Riegel in court with attorney Peter M Wolff.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is in counseling with the VA. Defense requests another date in 3 weeks. Court grants request. Defense to advise on the next date how they will proceed.  Hearing scheduled for August 4, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Hearing on July 13, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Peter M Wolff in court.   Defendant Matthew A Riegel did not appear.   Lesli S Boese appeared for the State of Wisconsin.     Attorney appears by authorization. Defense requests a date in 3 weeks. Court grants request.  Hearing scheduled for July 13, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Authorization to appear received and filed.
filed by Attorney Wolff.

Hearing on June 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Defendant Matthew A Riegel in court.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Defendant has applied but does not qualify for representation by the public defender's office.  The Defendant is sworn in and questioned by the Court.  The Court holds the petition and does not appoint counsel at this time and advises the Defendant to obtain counsel.  Hearing scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Hearing on June 1, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Defendant is not to have any violent contact with the witness.   Cash bail previously posted to be refunded to poster.

Defendant Matthew A Riegel in court.  Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises of right to an attorney.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 09:30 am.
